001package tictactoe;
002
003/**
004 * Represents an immutable direction in a two dimensional coordinate system.
005 * 
006 * @author Tapio Malmberg
007 */
008class Direction {
009    /**
010     * The x vector.
011     */
012    public final int xVec;
013    
014    /**
015     * The y vector.
016     */
017    public final int yVec;
018
019    /**
020     * Creates a new Direction with the given x and y vectors.
021     * @param xVec the x vector
022     * @param yVec the y vector
023     */
024    public Direction(int xVec, int yVec) {
025        this.xVec = xVec;
026        this.yVec = yVec;
027    }
028
029    /**
030     * Returns a Direction with the x and y vectors reversed.
031     * @return the reversed direction
032     */
033    public Direction reverse() {
034        return new Direction(-xVec, -yVec);
035    }
036}
